Author: wearetheresult
Text: I feel this. I feel so damn guilty, not only about eating, but the fact that I'm portioning myself smaller portions than my 4 & 3 year old and not even managing that. All while encouraging them to try bites of everything, finish their veggies, I know you didn't like it last time but let's try it again, gotta clear your plate to get dessert, etc. Meanwhile mine sits half eaten, usually going to them if they want more of something, or the husband. It's tiring.
